name: Tale of Zaggar Apotheosis
description:
Summary

To become a god, one must travel to The Tree of Life and replace one of the realm's 3 gods.

Yet in the realm of Zaggaria, achieving divinity is definitely not something that can be done easily, especially when such a status is coveted by many...

___________________________________________________________________________

Gameplay

Travel through the realm of Zaggaria with Giovanni, your trusty Chronodemon-Whale, and other companions you meet along your journey.

Level up your characters, manage your resources, and encounter mysterious beings in this turn-based RPG game inspired by games such as FTL and Darkest Dungeon.
